```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", " "))
litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

pups_df =
  read_csv(
    "data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv", 
    na = c("NA", ".", ""), 
    skip = 3)
pups_df =
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
